titleStmt.title: Alderman Bunce his speech to the Lord Maior, Aldermen and Common-Council of London, touching the Kings resolution to accept of honourable conditions from a free-Parliament for his admitment.
titleStmt.author: Bunce, James, Sir, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.S. for O.H. and are to be sold at the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 24. 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
